section.title: PrimaryGeneratorAction.cc
section.programlisting: 00001 00002 // 00003 // 00005 // 00006 // PrimaryGeneratorAction 00007 // 00008 // Donovan Maire, Thomas Guilbaud, Transmutex, 18/10/2019 00009 // 00011 // 00012 00013 // Class 00014 #include "Randomize.hh" 00015 #include "PrimaryGeneratorAction.hh" 00016 #include "DetectorConstruction.hh" 00017 #include "TMXRandomDistribution3D.hh" 00018 #include "TMXAbstractBeamPipe.hh" 00019 00020 // GEANT4 libraries 00021 #include "G4ParticleGun.hh" 00022 #include "G4SystemOfUnits.hh" 00023 #include "G4PhysicalConstants.hh" 00024 #include "G4ParticleTable.hh" 00025 #include "G4RunManager.hh" 00026 #include "G4ios.hh" 00027 #include "G4Navigator.hh" 00028 #include "G4VPhysicalVolume.hh" 00029 #include "G4PhysicalVolumeStore.hh" 00030 00031 #include "G4FPYSamplingOps.hh" 00032 #include "G4FFGEnumerations.hh" 00033 #include "G4TransportationManager.hh" 00034 #include "TMXkeff.hh" 00035 00036 using std::sqrt; 00037 using std::cos; 00038 using std::sin; 00039 00040 using namespace std; 00041 00042 #include "G4AutoLock.hh" 00043 namespace { G4Mutex myHEPPrimGenMutex = G4MUTEX_INITIALIZER; } 00044 00046 00047 // PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction(G4int Nsource, G4double Esource, G4int int_Option) 00048 // PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction(G4int Nsource, G4double Esource, G4int int_Option, G4int geometry, TMXRandomDistribution3D& RadiusAnglesHeight) 00049 PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction(G4int Nsource, TMXInputParameters* parameters, TMXRandomDistribution3D& RadiusAnglesHeight, TMXExternalSource& sourcecExt) 00050 : G4VUserPrimaryGeneratorAction(), 00051 fParticleGun(0), 00052 m_p{parameters}, 00053 m_sourceExt(sourcecExt) 00054 { 00055 // std::cout << "Definition of G4ParticleGun" << std::endl; 00056 // Initialize(Nsource, Esource, int_Option, geometry, RadiusAnglesHeight); 00057 if(m_p->int_Option != 20) 00058 Initialize(Nsource, RadiusAnglesHeight); 00059 else 00060 fParticleGun = new G4ParticleGun(1); 00061 00062 if(m_p->SourceType.find("RezRad") !=std::string::npos){ //Garance test 00063 fParticleGun->SetParticleDefinition(G4ParticleTable::GetParticleTable()->FindParticle("neutron")); 00064 00065 return; 00066 } 00067 00068 if(!m_p->ExtSourcePath.empty()) 00069 { 00070 G4AutoLock autoLock(&myHEPPrimGenMutex); 00071 // autoLock.lock(); 00072 m_sourceExt.initialize(m_p->ExtSourcePath, m_p->Nparticles); 00073 m_sourceExt.setTargetTranslation(G4ThreeVector(0., 0., -122.15)); 00074 autoLock.unlock(); 00075 } 00076 // std::cout << "End of G4ParticleGun definition" << std::endl; 00077 } 00078 00080 00081 PrimaryGeneratorAction::~PrimaryGeneratorAction() 00082 { 00083 delete fParticleGun; 00084 } 00085 00087 /* 00088 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries(G4Event* anEvent) 00089 { 00090 // std::cout << "Begin of GeneratePrimaries" << std::endl; 00091 00092 if(m_p->Geometry == 2) { // Case of a water pool to test thermal neutron scattering 00093 for(int i=0; i<m_p->SourceNumber; ++i) { 00094 fParticleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection( G4ThreeVector(m_p->src_XYZdirection[i][0],m_p->src_XYZdirection[i][1],m_p->src_XYZdirection[i][2]) ); 00095 00096 const std::vector<std::string>* TubeName = TMXAbstractBeamPipe::getTubeName(); 00097 for (G4PhysicalVolumeStore::iterator it_pv=G4PhysicalVolumeStore::GetInstance()->begin(); it_pv!=G4PhysicalVolumeStore::GetInstance()->end(); it_pv++) { 00098 if ((*it_pv)->GetName() == (G4String)("p"+(*TubeName)[0]) && (*it_pv)->GetCopyNo() == i) { 00099 fParticleGun->SetParticlePosition( (*it_pv)->GetTranslation() ); } 00100 } 00101 00102 fParticleGun->GeneratePrimaryVertex(anEvent); 00103 } 00104 } 00105 else { 00106 00108 // Beam position : profile = ellipse 00110 00111 // To automatically get the center of the world and h0 00112 const DetectorConstruction* detectorConstruction 00113 = static_cast<const DetectorConstruction*> 00114 (G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->GetUserDetectorConstruction()); 00115 G4double TargetZdistanceToBottom = detectorConstruction->GetTargetZdistanceToBottom(); // Heigth between the bottom of the well and the center of the target 00116 G4double h0 = detectorConstruction->Geth0(); // Height between the bottom of the well and the center of the world volume (concrete) 00117 00118 // TODO : get these values from the parameter file 00119 00120 G4double xp(0.), yp(0.), zp(0.); 00121 G4double x0 = -2000. *mm; //- 34. *mm; //-52.5*mm; // X position for ellipse center 00122 G4double y0 = 0. *mm; // Y position for ellipse center 00123 // End of TODO 00124 G4double z0 = h0 - TargetZdistanceToBottom; // Z position for ellipse center // To get automaticaly the target position //-567. *mm; 00125 00126 if(m_p->int_Option !=4) { // In every cases except for keff calculation 00127 RandomSamplingVerticalEllipse(x0, y0, z0, xp, yp, zp); 00128 } 00129 else { // If keff calculation 00130 x0 = 0; 00131 y0 = 0; 00132 RandomSamplingKeffRadiusAnglesHeight(x0, y0, z0, xp, yp, zp); 00133 } 00134 00135 // Set intial position of the primary particles 00136 fParticleGun->SetParticlePosition(G4ThreeVector( xp, yp, zp)); 00137 00138 // Generate the primary particles 00139 fParticleGun->GeneratePrimaryVertex(anEvent); 00140 00141 } 00142 00143 // std::cout << "End of GeneratePrimaries" << std::endl; 00144 } 00145 */ 00146 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries(G4Event* anEvent) 00147 { 00148 // std::cout << "Begin of GeneratePrimaries" << std::endl; 00149 00150 if(!m_p->ExtSourcePath.empty()) 00151 { 00152 //THERE ARE STILL PROBLEMS WITH PARALLEL CALCULATIONS 00153 00154 G4AutoLock autoLock(&myHEPPrimGenMutex); 00155 // autoLock.lock(); 00156 fParticleGun->SetParticleDefinition(G4ParticleTable::GetParticleTable()->FindParticle(m_sourceExt.getParticleID())); 00157 std::cout << m_sourceExt.getPosition() << " " << m_sourceExt.getDirection() << " " << m_sourceExt.getEnergy() << std::endl; 00158 fParticleGun->SetParticlePosition(m_sourceExt.getPosition()); 00159 fParticleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(m_sourceExt.getDirection()); 00160 fParticleGun->SetParticleEnergy(m_sourceExt.getEnergy()); 00161 fParticleGun->GeneratePrimaryVertex(anEvent); 00162 m_sourceExt.next(); 00163 autoLock.unlock(); 00164 return; 00165 } 00166 00167 00168 if(m_p->int_Option == 20) 00169 { 00170 // default particle kinematic 00171 G4ParticleTable* particleTable = G4ParticleTable::GetParticleTable(); 00172 G4String particleName; 00173 G4ParticleDefinition* particle 00174 = particleTable->FindParticle(particleName="neutron"); 00175 fParticleGun->SetParticleDefinition(particle); 00176 TMXkeff::getInstance()->inGeneratePrimaries(fParticleGun, anEvent); 00177 return; 00178 } 00179 if(m_p->SourceType.find("RezRad") !=std::string::npos){ 00180 00181 //Position and orientation of the source 00182 G4ThreeVector Position_source(m_p->src_XYZposition [0][0],m_p->src_XYZposition [0][1],m_p->src_XYZposition [0][2]); 00183 G4ThreeVector Orientation(m_p->src_XYZdirection[0][0],m_p->src_XYZdirection[0][1],m_p->src_XYZdirection[0][2]); 00184 00185 // Generation of position of the particle alpha in the neutron emmiter cylinder (first, not accounting for position and orientation of the source 00186 // Position in the plane of the source (circle) 00187 G4double x0 = 0; 00188 G4double y0 = 0; 00189 do{ 00190 x0 = 8.8*(2*G4UniformRand()-1); 00191 y0 = 8.8*(2*G4UniformRand()-1); 00192 00193 }while((x0*x0)+(y0*y0) > (8.8*8.8)); 00194 //Position along the height of the source 00195 G4double z0 = 16 * (G4UniformRand() - 0.5); 00196 00197 //creation of the position G4 vector, translation and rotation 00198 00199 G4RotationMatrix* R = DefineRotationMatrix(Orientation); 00200 00201 G4ThreeVector Position (x0,y0,z0); 00202 if(R) 00203 { 00204 Position = G4ThreeVector(R->xx()*x0 + R->xy()*y0 + R->xz()*z0, 00205 R->yx()*x0 + R->yy()*y0 + R->yz()*z0, 00206 R->zx()*x0 + R->zy()*y0 + R->zz()*z0); 00207 } 00208 Position = Position + Position_source; 00209 //Setting it for the particle 00210 fParticleGun->SetParticlePosition(Position); 00211 00212 00213 00214 // Generation of the direction of the particle (isotropic hopefully) 00215 //On a sphere 00216 G4double costhetad = 2*G4UniformRand() - 1; 00217 G4double phid = 2*M_PI * G4UniformRand(); 00218 00219 G4double xd = sin(acos(costhetad)) * cos(phid) *cm; 00220 G4double zd = sin(acos(costhetad)) * sin(phid) *cm; 00221 G4double yd = costhetad *cm; 00222 00223 //Setting it for the particle 00224 fParticleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(G4ThreeVector(xd,yd,zd)); 00225 00226 00227 // Generation of the particle energy 00228 G4double sample = G4UniformRand(); 01096 vertex->SetPrimary(pp); 01097 } 01098 anEvent->AddPrimaryVertex(vertex); 01099 #endif 01100 } 01101 } 01102 01103 G4ThreeVector PrimaryGeneratorAction::GetRandomGaussianPlaneDistribution(G4double FWHM, G4double offsetAlongAxis, std::string direction) { 01104 CLHEP::RandGauss GaussianDistributionX = CLHEP::RandGauss(new CLHEP::RanecuEngine()); 01105 CLHEP::RandGauss GaussianDistributionY = CLHEP::RandGauss(new CLHEP::RanecuEngine()); 01106 01107 G4double xPos = GaussianDistributionX.fire(0., FWHM/2.355); 01108 G4double yPos = GaussianDistributionY.fire(0., FWHM/2.355); 01109 01110 if (direction == "X") 01111 return(G4ThreeVector(offsetAlongAxis, xPos, yPos)); 01112 else if (direction == "Y") 01113 return(G4ThreeVector(yPos, offsetAlongAxis, xPos)); 01114 else // Z by default 01115 return(G4ThreeVector(xPos, yPos, offsetAlongAxis)); 01122 yPos = 2. * G4UniformRand() - 1.; 01123 } 01124 if (direction == "X") 01125 return(G4ThreeVector(offsetAlongAxis, xPos*radius, yPos*radius)); 01126 else if (direction == "Y") 01127 return(G4ThreeVector(yPos*radius, offsetAlongAxis, xPos*radius));
